titleStmt.title: Sheperdy spiritualiz'd or, The improvement of a shepherd's life to soul-advantage. By James Woode, an unworthy follower of the great shepherd of souls
titleStmt.author: Wood, James, 1608-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.R. for Thomas Parkhurst, and are to be sold by Joseph How bookseller in Castle-street in Dublin,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
